authors: Candice Jackson For Daily Mail Australia
description: The Bachelor's Tiffany Scanlon appears to be relishing her single status, with the self-described 'experience junkie' flaunting her enviable frame completely NAKED on the beach this week.
title: Tiffany Scanlon strips down NAKED to enjoy skinny dip
title_page: Tiffany Scanlon strips down NAKED to enjoy skinny dip | Daily Mail Online
text:
She broke up with her Bachelor co-star girlfriend Megan Marx last month.
And Tiffany Scanlon appears to be relishing her single status, with the self-described 'experience junkie' flaunting her enviable frame completely naked on the beach.
The 30-year-old showed off her bikini body with a series of Instagram snaps on Wednesday, which documenting a skinny dip session in Western Australia.
'Nothin beats a nudie swim!' Tiffany Scanlon strips down COMPLETELY NAKED to enjoy skinny dip in clear ocean waters in Western Australia, as she shares images to Instagram this week
Claim to fame: Tiffany is known as one half of The Bachelor's first-ever lesbian couple, having dated former Bachelor co-star Megan Marx following their appearance on the show last year. The pair announced their split last month
One half of The Bachelor's first-ever lesbian couple appeared to beam with high-spirits after the swim, claiming it made for a 'free and happy hump day.'
She captioned one of the snaps, which highlighted her pert derriere: 'Nothin beats a nudie swim!(sic)'
In another upload, Tiffany stood on the sand holding her breasts as she walked along the water's edge.
The former reality star wrote: 'Being nude in nature is among my fav things to do. It brings together vulnerability and empowerment in a way not much else does.'
'Being nude in nature is among my fav things to do': Tiffany claimed the experience is a micture of 'vulnerability and empowerment'
The blonde bombshell flaunted her tanned gym-honed figure as her trim pins and posterior was completely uncovered.
Tiffany let her blonde hair flow down her back as she rocked the effortless beachy waves.
Her swim appeared to be filmed by a drone, as she was seen jumping over a wave into the beautiful clear water's of Western Australia's Esperance.
Appearing to be a throwback, the lifestyle blogger also added: 'From where I'd rather be!'
'From where I'd rather be!' Tiffany regularly flaunts her ample assets and toned body on social media
They WEREN'T shy! After months of speculation the couple confirmed they were an item late last year with a series of raunchy posts, before moving to a Bali love nest in January
Tiffany and Megan met while competing for Richie Strahan's affection as contestants on last year's season of The Bachelor.
After months of speculation the couple confirmed they were an item late last year, moving to a Bali love nest in January.
But the romance abruptly ended with Tiffany returning to Australia and Megan confirming last month that they had broken up.
